alert.note: Alert for Eastern Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 4:01PM EDT until April 19 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Virginia, Gloucester, Mathews, Norfolk/Portsmouth, York, Newport News and Hampton/Poquoson Counties, and Virginia Beach. In North Carolina, Eastern Currituck County. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
